title: alforro
author: alforro
content: I release the coins when the funds are on my accountIf I dont reply fast you can reach me on telegram @alforroWe can do bigger amounts tooYou can follow me on my social media https://linktr.ee/alforroI accept wise transfer, bank transfer in USD and EUR. I can sell BTC, ETH, USDT, XMRCurrently I am using AgoraDesk and LocalCoinSwap for escrow

comments.author: alforro
comments.body: buying and selling btc accepting zelle

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: Can you accept Cash App dollars? I can buy a little amount of BTC dollars.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on January 27, 2023, 09:33:58 AMCan you accept Cash App dollars? I can buy a little amount of BTC dollars.Yes I also buy BTC and I can also accept your cashapp dollar .Hope OP doesn't mind me trading on his thread.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 19, 2023, 01:53:38 PMQuote from: roksana.hee on January 27, 2023, 09:33:58 AMCan you accept Cash App dollars? I can buy a little amount of BTC dollars.Yes I also buy BTC and I can also accept your cashapp dollar .Hope OP doesn't mind me trading on his thread.His profile was online in the past few days. I doubt if he missed checking in his thread for the offer that was made back in January.Alternatively, If you want to get in business, I think it's better to open up a new thread in order to avoid offending some people. Not all people are the same
